xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: ### Home page platform.appwithinminutes.homePageTitle=数分钟之内的应用程序 platform.appwithinminutes.description=基于XWiki强大的结构化数据管理系统，在几分钟之内创建协作式Web应用程序。 platform.appwithinminutes.createAppButtonLabel=创建应用 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTableHeading=应用 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.title=应用 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.author=上一个作者 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.date=更新日期 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable._actions=操作 platform.appwithinminutes.grantSpaceAdminRightsSaveComment=授予空间管理权限。 ### AWM Applications panel entry platform.appwithinminutes.appPanelCreateEntry=创建你自己的！ ### Wizard step platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHeading=第{0}—{1}步 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.name=名称 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.title=命名你的应用 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.description=选择应用名称 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.name=结构体 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.title=整理数据 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.description=描述应用数据 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.name=条目 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.title=找到您的数据 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.description=选择存储数据的位置 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.name=介绍 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.title=自定义您的应用程序主页 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.description=自定义应用程序主页 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonLabel=下一步 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonTip=转到下一步 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonLabel=完成 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonTip=转到应用程序主页 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonLabel=上一步 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonTip=转到上一步 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpTitle=步骤 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpDescription=该向导将指导您完成创建应用程序的过程。这些是您将要执行的步骤： ### Wizard Step 1: Application Name appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.label=位置 appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.hint=页面层次结构中将在其中创建应用程序的位置。 appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.label=父级 appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.hint=新应用程序的父级。如果要创建顶级应用程序，请将此字段留空。 appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.placeholder=父级路径 appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.title=代码 appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.description=这是应用程序代码所在的地方。 appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.hiddenPagesInfo=即使您当前的用户配置文件设置阻止，也会列出隐藏的页面，否则，所有应用程序代码页都不可见，因为默认情况下它们都被隐藏。 platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePageTitle=创建应用程序 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameLabel=应用程序名称 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameHint=应用程序名称确定主页URL和应用程序代码的存储位置。 platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewHomePageUrlLabel=应用程序主页URL platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewCodeSpaceLabel=应用程序代码位置 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameIsUsedWarning=该应用程序已经存在。如果转到下一步，则将编辑现有应用程序。 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameEmptyError=请输入应用程序名称。 ### Wizard Step 2: Application Structure ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorPaletteTitle=Field Palette platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorPaletteHint=从调色板中拖放字段以创建将用于输入数据的表单。 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorCanvasHint=将字段从调色板中拖放到该区域中。 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTemplateLabel=更新模板 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTemplateHint=模板（{0}）存储默认字段值。 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateSheetLabel=更新工作表 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateSheetHint=工作表({0})用于显示和编辑结构化数据。 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTranslationsLabel=更新翻译 ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTranslationsHint=Update the translation of field pretty names and list values ({0}). ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorMultipleSheetsWarning=This class has multiple sheets. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDuplicateFieldNameError=The class has two fields with the same name: {0} ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorTemplateSaveComment=Update default values ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorBindSheetSaveComment=Bind class sheet ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerAcceptSelectedDate=OK ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerClearSelectedDate=Clear ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerSelectCurrentTime=Now ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerSelectCurrentDate=Today ### Static List Editor ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorItemValueLabel=Value ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorItemIDLabel=ID ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorAddItemLabel=Add ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorDeleteItemLabel=Delete ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.hint=Application entries are wiki pages that contain structured data. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.icon.hint=The icon associated with an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.description.hint=Short description of an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.visibilityRestrictions.name=Where to create the entries from ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.visibilityRestrictions.hint=If no location is selected, the entries can be created from any page. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictions.name=Where to create the entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictions.hint=If no location is selected, the entries can be created anywhere in the wiki. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.name=Don't enforce entry location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.hint=Use the locations specified above only as suggestions, allowing the user to select a different location when creating an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.terminal.hint=Whether the application entries should be terminal pages or not. ### Wizard Step 3: Application Presentation ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorClassFieldColumnGroupLabel=Application fields ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorGenericColumnGroupLabel=Generic columns ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorHelpTitle=Tip ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorHelpDescription=Generic live table columns are independent of your application structure. They provide information about the pages that hold your application data. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocTitleColumnName=Page Title ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocTitleColumnDescription=The title of the page that contains application data ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocNameColumnName=Page Name ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocNameColumnDescription=The name of the page that contains application data ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocLocationColumnName=Location ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocLocationColumnDescription=The location of the page that contains application data ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocAuthorColumnName=Last Author ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocAuthorColumnDescription=The user who last edited the application data ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreatorColumnName=Creator ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreatorColumnDescription=The user who created the application data ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocDateColumnName=Date ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocDateColumnDescription=The date when the application data was last edited ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreationDateColumnName=Creation Date ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreationDateColumnDescription=The date when the application data was created ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorActionsColumnName=Actions ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorActionsColumnDescription=A list of actions that can be performed on the application data, such as edit and delete ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAttachmentsColumnName=Attachments ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAttachmentsColumnDescription=A special column to display links to the attachments of a data page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorImagesColumnName=Images ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorImagesColumnDescription=A special column to display the images attached to a data page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAvatarColumnName=Avatar ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAvatarColumnDescription=A special column to display the user avatar. Works only for a table bound to the XWiki.XWikiUsers class ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorTitleHint=The application title to be displayed on the application home page, on the applications panel and live table, on the breadcrumb, etc. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDescriptionHint=The content to be displayed on the homepage above the live table with the application data. Use it to describe the application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorColumnsHint=Select the columns you would like to include in the live table displayed on the application home page. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorSaveComment=Update LiveTable ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorMoveColumnHint=Drag and drop to change the order ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeleteColumnHint=Delete ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAddColumnHint=Add selected column ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeprecatedColumnsWarning=Some columns are deprecated, probably because the corresponding application fields have been deleted. Do you want to remove them? Yes / No ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIcon=Icon ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIconHintWithPicker=The application icon. You can select an icon from the icon picker or you can reference an attached image. ### Wizard Step 4: Application home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableHeading=Entries ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableEditEntryActionName=Edit ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableDeleteEntryActionName=Delete ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageActionsHeading=Actions ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryLabel=Add ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryHint=Add new entry ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEntryNameLabel=Entry name: ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteEntriesLabel=Delete all entries ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEditAppLabel=Edit application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageTranslateAppLabel=Translate application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteAppLabel=Delete application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageMovedWarning=The application might not function correctly because it has been renamed or moved without updating the code. Please edit the application and follow the steps in order to update the code. ### Missing: AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass_description=Description ### Missing: AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass_columns=Live Table Columns ### Delete application dialog ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppConfirmation=The application {0} and ALL its entries will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue? ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppEntriesConfirmation=ALL the entries of the application {0} will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue? ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppDoesNotExistError=The specified application does not exist. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppInvalidAppError=The specified name is not a valid App Within Minutes application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppNotSpecifiedError=No application name was specified. ### Rename Application ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.changeAppTitleInfo=You can change the application title without renaming the application just by editing the application home page. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.regenerateAppCodeWarning=The application code is going to be regenerated if you rename the application. Code customizations will be overwritten as a consequence. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.newName.label=New Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.pageExistsError=A page with this name already exists at the selected location. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.locationForbiddenError=You are not allowed to move the application to the selected location. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.location.label=New Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where to move the application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.parent.label=New Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.parent.hint=The new parent page. Leave this field empty if you want to move the application to the top of the page hierarchy. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.inProgress=Renaming application... ### Missing:
